name: Duress
description:
Today is another day. . .

Today is another day, and you have to hold it together!

You cannot stop time: Maneuver your room to rebound the clock contained within it until the end. But be careful- it can break free!

Building pressure: Time won't stand still- if the clock gets too big or too small it is the end. Use the "Free/Firm" modes to switch between grow and shrink.

Is it worth it?: The ending doesn't change the gameplay, but it does change some visuals and text content (no spoilers here)- there's a tone to be had.
